synopsis.text: Girl named Illya finds herself in a world on the brink of collapse, where the Ainsworth family holds the key to salvation through the Holy Grail. However, this redemption comes at a harrowing cost: the life of a magical girl, Miyu. Unwilling to part with his sister, Miyu's protective brother, Shirou, vows to challenge the Ainsworth family and find an alternative solution. As the stakes rise, Illya must navigate the complexities of sacrifice and love to uncover a path that saves both Miyu and the crumbling world around them. Will Illya's determination and courage be enough to change their fate and create a harmonious future for all?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
